thread.title: Michel Platini says allegations against him are "astonishingly vague," vows to contest ban
thread.title_full: Michel Platini says allegations against him are "astonishingly vague," vows to contest ban

title: Michel Platini says allegations against him are "astonishingly vague," vows to contest ban
text:
Michel Platini says allegations against him are “astonishingly vague,” vows to contest ban By -   
NYON, Switzerland (AP) - Michel Platini says allegations against him are “astonishingly vague,” vows to contest ban.
